name: BOYSEN®® Natural Wood Paste Filler B‑60

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Natural Wood Paste Filler B‑60 is a quality filler for sealing and filling open grains in interior woodworks. It produces a smoothened finish for the succeeding clear coats of varnish.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Sand surface until the wooden surface is smooth to the touch. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply wood filler. Open grain wood can be filled with BOYSEN®® Natural Wood Paste Filler B‑60 using a putty knife. The filler may be tinted with stain to match the desired shade. Allow the filler to set for 15 minutes then rub off excess across the grain. Let it dry overnight.
